snippet.title: Synth Riders Experience™ - Barbie™ Dance ‘n Dream [Release Trailer] Meta Quest, PSVR2, SteamVR, AVP
snippet.description:
💖 Barbie™ dances into VR in Synth Riders! 💖 

Synth Riders Experience™ - Barbie™ Dance 'n Dream is here! 🎀

Enter the immersive world of Barbie while dancing to “Barbie Dreams” by @WE_FIFTYFIFTY  from Barbie™ The Album! 💃✨

Play the game today: http://bit.ly/playsr

#SynthRiders #BarbieDanceNDream #Music #VR #MetaQuest #PSVR2 #SteamVR
